course_description: The capstone is designed for MA in Bioethics students to pursue a substantive bioethical project instead of (but comparable in work to) a thesis, such as a legislative project, bioethical narrative, bioethics education program or series of related op-ed publications.The capstone experience is intended to reflect the student's broad mastery of a bioethical issue.
sections: Class Nbr: 6023, Section #: 1, Type: IND, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Eisen, Status: Open
